title: Nosy Be
description: Paradise island with pristine beaches and spectacular sunsets.
overview: Discover the tropical paradise of Nosy Be, with its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Nosy Be
itinerary.description: Transfer to the hotel and relax on the beach.

itinerary.title: Marine Adventure
itinerary.description: Snorkeling and diving in vibrant coral reefs.

itinerary.title: Island Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Lokobe Reserve and spot unique wildlife.

itinerary.title: Relaxation
itinerary.description: Enjoy a spa day or explore local markets.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to the airport for your return flight.

title: Antananarivo
description: Vibrant capital with rich culture, history, and colorful markets.
overview: Explore the bustling capital of Madagascar, Antananarivo, known for its historic sites and lively atmosphere.

itinerary.title: City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit the Royal Palace and vibrant local markets.

itinerary.title: Cultural Immersion
itinerary.description: Experience traditional Malagasy cuisine and performances.

itinerary.title: Historical Sites
itinerary.description: Explore the sacred hill of Ambohimanga.

title: Toamasina
description: Largest port with palm-fringed beaches and a tropical vibe.
overview: Experience the vibrant port city of Toamasina, famous for its beaches, tropical vibe, and colonial architecture.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.description: Welcome to Toamasina and check-in at the hotel.

itinerary.title: City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit the bustling markets and colonial buildings.

itinerary.title: Relaxation
itinerary.description: Spend the day at the beach before departure.

title: Tuléar
description: Sunny city with coral reefs and stunning beaches.
overview: Enjoy the sunny coastal city of Tuléar, known for its coral reefs, vibrant marine life, and relaxed atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.description: Check-in and relax at the hotel.

itinerary.title: Beach Day
itinerary.description: Explore the stunning beaches and enjoy water activities.

itinerary.title: Coral Reefs
itinerary.description: Snorkeling and diving in the coral reefs.

itinerary.title: Local Market
itinerary.description: Visit the local market for unique crafts and souvenirs.

itinerary.title: Wildlife
itinerary.description: Spot lemurs and other wildlife in nearby reserves.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to the airport for your journey home.
